Jose Canseco

Jose Canseco

Date: Thursday, 5/1/1999
Subject: Progress of Ryan Drese
Dear Sir,
Ryan Drese has nothing more to prove at A St. Lucie Mets!
He has an ERA of 2.48 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1999
Subject: Status of David Newhan
Dear Sir,
David Newhan has an AVG of .248 at AA Binghamton Mets!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director
